home.title: Welcome to Logic in Philosophy
home.intro: Explore the frontiers of logic, language, and mind.

about.title: About the Project
about.body: Logic in Philosophy investigates the intersection of formal reasoning and philosophical inquiry.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.body: Our annual workshop brings together scholars to discuss recent developments in logic and philosophy.

resources.title: Resources
resources.body: Download readings, slides, and handouts for teaching and research.

archive.title: Archive
archive.body: Browse past events, recordings, and publications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: Have a question or collaboration idea? Reach out via email.
